name: A Moderate Amount
description:
Your enemies adapt to your weapons.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Looking - Mouse

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

Change Weapon - Scroll Wheel

Hint: You can click as fast as you want

Credits:

Fintan Neff - Programmer, Actor

Tobey-Julian Joseph - Audio Design, Actor

Benjamin Pielocik - Artist, Level Design, Actor

Alura Leet - Artist, Level Design

Cassidy Araujo - Artist

Fall 2021 Game Jam Submission
